name: The Vanquisher: Create With Code Game Jam
name_original: The Vanquisher: Create With Code Game Jam
description:
Beacome a ghost reaper, and illuminate the world!

IMPORTANT NOTE: I encountered some wierd build for webGL problems so It couldn`t be run in the browser. After the game Jam time was over, I built it for windows(and also corrected a simple problem of the game!) and put it here and updated my submission.  I thought it doesn`t qualify for the game jam as the time was over, but maybe someone can have little fun for my game, so i decided to upload it.

Credits for the assets

SFX/Particle effects: https://kenney.nl/

Platformer Assets: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/environments/free-platform-game-assets-...

Background Music: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/orchestral/free-fantasy-advent...

Ghost Asset/Graphics Edit: Gheisari.mr@gmail.com
